original_text: The Israelites took hold of 200,000 wives, sons and daughters of Judah's soldiers. They took them as their prisoners, even though they were their relatives. They also carried away to Samaria a lot of valuable things.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 그들의 형제 중에서 그들의 아내와 자녀를 합하여 이십만 명을 사로잡고 그들의 재물을 많이 노략하여 사마리아로 가져가니

sentences.original_text: The Israelites took hold of 200,000 wives
sons and daughters of Judah's soldiers
They took them as their prisoners
even though they were their relatives
They also carried away to Samaria
